chillyrolls.title: ChillyRolls
chillyrolls.description: Chillyrolls is a worldwide brand aiming to bridge between Web3 and the real world, by providing it's holders the chance to make a real passive income through their different ventures under the brand of ChillyRolls

content.heading: About the game
paragraph: Chillyrolls is a worldwide brand aiming to bridge between Web3 and the real world, by providing it's holders the chance to make a real passive income through their different ventures under the brand of ChillyRolls

content.heading: They are aiming to launch
paragraph:
They are aiming to launch :

- Real Merch Stores around the world ( Europe, USA...)
- Product brand : our toilet paper brand
- Music Festival : annual music festival we call it ChillyFestival !
